Text: Michael BrownTana Michael has asked me to get in touch with you to apologise for not contacting you earlier and to say that unfortunately Clarissa is very ill and in and out of hospital so he will not be able to contact for the next couple of weeks Consequently he will not be in the office the rest of the week and will also not be in next week He is not picking up his emails but is picking up voicemails If you would like me to pass any message on to him please just email me or call me on Thanks Fiona
